definitions.definition: The act of fomenting ; the application of warm , soft , medicinal substances , as for the purpose of easing pain by relaxing the skin , or of discussing ( dispersing ) tumours .
A lotion or poultice applied to a diseased or injured part of the body.

main_definition: The act of fomenting ; the application of warm , soft , medicinal substances , as for the purpose of easing pain by relaxing the skin , or of discussing ( dispersing ) tumours .
secondary_definitions: A lotion or poultice applied to a diseased or injured part of the body.
